longBusinessSummary: Nojima Corporation operates digital home electronics retail stores in Japan and internationally. It operates through Digital Home Appliance Specialty Store, Carrier Shop Operation, Internet Business, Overseas Business, and Financial Business segments. The Digital Home Appliance Specialty Store segment engages in sale of digital AV-related equipment, such as flat-panel TVs and household electrical appliances and related delivery, installation, and repair services; sales of IT/information-related equipment, such as personal computers, home-use game-related equipment and software, and the provision of services such as solutions, setups, and related repairs; consumer electronics; information services; and communication equipment. The Carrier Shop Operation segment sells communication-related equipment, such as mobile phones, and provides related services. The Internet Business segment provides broadband connection services, services such as communication and security, and various information services using the Internet. The Overseas Business segment sells digital AV-related equipment, IT/information related equipment, household electrical appliances and household furniture, and provides related services, including solutions and setup. The Financial Business segment provides financial products trading services, such as over-the-counter foreign exchange trading and exchange stock index margin trading. Nojima Corporation was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.
